name: Green Beans Vinaigrette
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, green beans, red onion, low calorie, low-fat, side dish

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and trim green beans, and place in steamer basket over hot water. Cook about 7 minutes, until the beans are firm but tender.
Combine the onion with oil, vinegar and mustard in a serving dish; mix well.
When green beans are cooked, drain well and stir into dressing.
